body: i thank the 2 kind strangers in the comment section

There's is no ntr in any of these. I've read them all.

One story has a girl naughty side being manifested and takes matters in her hands to seduce to guy all to help her real self.


Other sorry has potential to be ntr but it isn't because the guy gets lured into an open relationship and instead hooks up with the sister. No bad feelings involved for the ugly readers who enjoy hurting others.
There's ntr in one of these.
